ISSUE.TITLE: Feature-Policy superceeded
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 The feature policy has now been renamed to Permissions-Policy in [web.config](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/develop/src/Presentation/Nop.Web/web.config): `<add name="Feature-Policy" value="accelerometer 'none'; camera 'none'; geolocation 'none'; gyroscope 'none'; magnetometer 'none'; microphone 'none'; payment *; usb 'none'" />` Should now be: `<add name="Permissions-Policy" value="accelerometer 'none'; camera 'none'; geolocation 'none'; gyroscope 'none'; magnetometer 'none'; microphone 'none'; payment *; usb 'none'" />` Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/88132/feature-policy-superceeded
